title: kaDaittEra vENDum
sahitya:
kaDaittEra vENDum ayyanE un karuNaiyAlE


anupallavi

  maDattanamAgat-tiriyum manattai maDakki-pulanai oDukki nAnum


caraNam    veri pIditta vEngai pOlE vimmum aghandaiyai gam enraDakku
kuri guNamaTra arivai uLLE kUDik-kavalaip-pEyai sADi
kOdilAda jyOtiyAna AdiyE un bOdhamuNDu
